name: nebulosity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cloud of gas or dust in space, or the appearance of such a cloud: The highly powered telescopes failed to reveal any trace of nebulosity. They were unable to detect any stars or nebulosities of gleaming gas.
More examplesFewer examplesThe map outlined all the regions of dark nebulosity.The nebula is visible with the naked eye, and through binoculars it appears as an area of diffuse nebulosity.We were able to see details and nebulosity extending far from the core in all directions.
